name: Sol System
description: Birthplace of humanity and capital of the United Earth Federation.
defenses: Orbital Defense Grid, Sol Defense Fleet

pointsOfInterest.name: Luna Mining Complex

notes: Home system - heavily fortified and populated. Primary hub for human civilization.
